ComicInfo.Summary:
DANIEL WAY's tale of horror at sea continues as the coast guard crew's plan to start a new life on a remote island continues to develop. But something is rotten on board the ship and the more the Captain tries to cut it out, the more his control starts to decompose. Crossed C-Day 2014 is coming and the best way to prepare for the annual horror is to read as much Crossed: Badlands as possible!
Available with Regular cover by Fernando Heinz, Wraparound and Torture covers by Rafa Ortiz and special Red Crossed Incentive cover.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Fernando Heinz (a) & Digikore Studios (c) | 1 | Torture | Torture Cover | Rafa Ortiz (a) & Digikore Studios (c) | 2 | Wrap | Wraparound Cover | Rafa Ortiz (a) & Digikore Studios (c) | 3 | RI | Retailer Incentive "Red Crossed" Cover | Fernando Heinz (a) & Digikore Studios (c) | 4 |
